speaker: Chris Lauren
title: Train Machine Learning Models with Azure ML in VS Code
description:
In this episode, we will provide step by step guidance on how to train machine learning models using the Visual Studio Code Tools for AI extension and Azure Machine Learning service.

To learn more see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/service/how-to-vscode-train-deploy https://youtu.be/F0LEAP9FoIE
